name: Full plate, sword'n'board knight for OC/MTS
author: Swagtrooper

posts.author: Swagtrooper
posts.content:
Hail mighty ECBers!
First of all, quick introduction of myself. Im returning player of NwN, mostly played oc and sou/hotu. Now i want to make my first 40 lvl toon and after reading mts topic here (which was super fun on its own btw) i decided to start in OC and then play mts all to level 40.
Back in the day i was mostly playing rogue type dex builds, so now i want to try something new. Im looking for heavy armed str based build, human or half-orc, with heavy armor and shield, horned helm, frightening weapon, probably a bastard sword, who will fearlessly charge into greatly outnumbering foes. Shield is preffered because ive read in mts topic that very powerful ones can be found there.
Classes are not set, but i assume barbarian will be a bit useless in mts, where i can cap abilities so rage will only give me a penalty to ac. That said, this kind of epic hero toon will probably not be sorc or wiz.
Feats and skills also can be anything, probably devcrit is preffered since it is a str build. Also im not sure if there are any mts specifically preffered skills like search for hidden things or alike, i'd be grateful on any insight on that.
